Stop.name: storybook-build-validation
Stop.description: Validates that Storybook builds successfully before stopping
Stop.command: npx -y @thebushidocollective/han hook run --fail-fast --dirs-with .storybook -- npm run build-storybook

SubagentStop.name: storybook-build-validation
SubagentStop.description: Validates that Storybook builds successfully when agents complete
SubagentStop.command: npx -y @thebushidocollective/han hook run --fail-fast --dirs-with .storybook -- npm run build-storybook
